Method Detail

getRelativeDate

public static java.lang.String getRelativeDate(java.util.Calendar date)
Returns the difference between now and the given date in a relative way, for example as 5 hours ago or in 3 days.

Parameters:
date - the date to express relatively
Returns:
a string contating the relative phrase

isSameDate

public static boolean isSameDate(java.util.Calendar a,
                                 java.util.Calendar b)
Determines whether two Calendar objects represent the same date (ignoring time values).

Parameters:
a - the first date
b - the second date
Returns:
true if the Calendar objects represent the same date, and false if they do not.
